ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ((PRIORVALUE( Status__c ) <> 'Self Assessment (Employee)') && ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Self Assessment (Employee)')) && ($Profile.Name <> "System Administrator") && ($Profile.Name <> "Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)") && $Profile.Name <> "Developer Administrator (Non US)"
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Status back to Self Assessment (Employee)
